type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.AbstractCompile
type.description: * The base class for all JVM-based language compilation tasks.

method.name: getClasspath
method.description: * Returns the classpath to use to compile the source files. * * @return The classpath.

method.name: getDestinationDir
method.description: * Returns the directory to generate the {@code .class} files into. * * @return The destination directory.

method.name: getSourceCompatibility
method.description: * Returns the Java language level to use to compile the source files. * * @return The source language level.

method.name: getTargetCompatibility
method.description: * Returns the target JVM to generate the {@code .class} files for. * * @return The target JVM.

method.name: setClasspath
method.description: * Sets the classpath to use to compile the source files. * * @param configuration The classpath. Must not be null, but may be empty.

method.name: setDestinationDir
method.description: * Sets the directory to generate the {@code .class} files into. * * @param destinationDir The destination directory. Must not be null.

method.name: setSourceCompatibility
method.description: * Sets the Java language level to use to compile the source files. * * @param sourceCompatibility The source language level. Must not be null.

method.name: setTargetCompatibility
method.description: * Sets the target JVM to generate the {@code .class} files for. * * @param targetCompatibility The target JVM. Must not be null.

property.name: classpath
property.description: * Returns the classpath to use to compile the source files. * * @return The classpath.

property.name: destinationDir
property.description: * Returns the directory to generate the {@code .class} files into. * * @return The destination directory.

property.name: sourceCompatibility
property.description: * Returns the Java language level to use to compile the source files. * * @return The source language level.

property.name: targetCompatibility
property.description: * Returns the target JVM to generate the {@code .class} files for. * * @return The target JVM.
